ygData.subject: Re: Why are you playing a SK
ygData.msgSnippet: And I play(ed) a Shadowknight for the very same reasons as sister Xillith. Unfortunately, I made the mistake of doing so on Veeshan. Though a Necromancer now,
ygData.messageBody:
And I play(ed) a Shadowknight for the very same reasons as sister Xillith.
Unfortunately, I made the mistake of doing so on Veeshan. Though a
Necromancer now, I would think twice about engaging a Shadowknight where I
would attack a warrior or other hybrid immediately.

Malvolin(Teir'Dal Necromancer)--Rallos Zek
Azalin(Human Shadowknight)--CandyLand


-----Original Message-----
From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, June 05, 1999 9:22 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Why are you playing a SK


>From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
>
>
>Why the SK?
> I feel the SK represents a sinister and ferocious warrior who draws
her
>power from the blackest Abyss. A Knight of such fearsome calliber as to be
>the ONLY warrior class Mages are concerned with in PvP. Skilled at arms
and
>Necromancy, the Shadow Knight and good 'ol Gebeker (hehe), tear into mages
>and monsters with great ease.
> Soon my pet will dual wield, kick, AND bash. With me beside it
casting
>Fear and Engulfing Darkness, few escape my wrath. When the tables turn and
>the enemy is too great, I unleash the Hand of Innorruk!!! Thus returning
>the battle to MY favor! Still not enough? The pet will hold my retreat
and
>Shadow Step will deny ANYONE the benefit of my death (people, this has
saved
>me SO many times!). Why play a Shadow Knight?? Ask the other players why
>they ARE NOT!!
>
>There are obvious roleplay challenges and benefits. Up untill level 15,
the
>going was VERY rough as I am extremely interactive with other players. But
>understand this, the difficulties of our youth fuel our hate. Our hate
>feeds Innorruk and He in turn, and in due time, empowers us to be the
>vessels of wrath and chaos we were meant to be.
>
>Patience young Reapers, night WILL fall on Norrath.
>
>~Xillith, Lady of Pain
>Keeper of the Shadow Knight sept and beloved sister of The Blood Coven
>Rallos Zek ( where else? )
>
>
